title: RGG Summit Summer 2023 Livestream
description: The showcase from Yakuza developer Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio will be available to stream at 8pm Pacific / 11pm Eastern, meaning June 16 at 4am UK / 1pm AEST.

title: Grading Summer Game Fest 2023 - Next-Gen Console Watch
description: On this week's episode of Next-Gen Console Watch, it's the kick-off to a week's worth of gaming goodness, starting with Geoff Keighley's Games of Summer showcase. We'll have our reactions to all the major reveals (Marvel's Spider-Man 2 release date!) and surprises (Nicholas Cage?), the panel picks their favorite game of the show, and we slap a grade on the whole presentation.

title: Lies of P Demo - Full Gameplay Walkthrough
description:
Lies of P released a surprise demo at Summer Game Fest, so we've put our heads down and found the shortcuts, items and boss strategies to get you through the full demo for Lies of P.

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
02:56 - Krat Train Station (Tutorial)

21:20 - Parade Master Boss Fight
24:06 - Approaching Hotel Krat

1:09:38 - Krat City Hall continued

1:16:23 - Returning to Hotel Krat

#IGN #Gaming

title: The Venture Bros: Radiant is the Blood of the Baboon Heart - Official Trailer (2023) James Urbaniak
description:
The Venture Bros: Radiant is the Blood of the Baboon Heart is an all-new original movie based on the Adult Swim series set after the events of Season 7's finale. Doc’s latest invention will either bankrupt Team Venture or launch them to new heights, as Hank searches for himself, Dean searches for Hank, The Monarch searches for answers, and a mysterious woman from their pasts threatens to bring their entire world crashing down on them.

The Venture Bros: Radiant is the Blood of the Baboon Heart stars James Urbaniak, Patrick Warburton, Michael Sinterniklaas, Chris McCulloch, and Doc Hammer. The writers and executive producers are Jackson Publick and Doc Hammer along with Chris Prynoski, Shannon Prynoski, Antonio Canobbio, and Ben Kalina as executive producers. 

The Venture Bros: Radiant is the Blood of the Baboon Heart will be available on July 21 for Digital Purchase on Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Google Play, Vudu, and more. Blu-ray Disc will be available July 25 to purchase online and in-store at major retailers.

#IGN #AdultSwim

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Official Season 4 Multiplayer Trailer
description:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 and Warzone are ringing in a new season with Season 4 delivering new maps and weapons. Classic favorite map Showdown makes its way to the game along with Kunstenaar District for core multiplayer. New Gunfight maps include Mercado and Penthouse along with Mawizeh Marshlands and Ahkdar Village filling out new maps for Ground War maps. New weapons and skins are also available with Season 4 for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 and Warzone launching on June 14.

#IGN #CallofDuty #Gaming

title: Skull Island - Official Trailer (2023) Benjamin Bratt, Betty Gilpin, Mae Whitman
description:
Skull Island is an all-new animated series aiming to take viewers on an unforgettable adventure with a group of explorers. Charlie (Nicolas Cantu), Mike (Darren Barnet), Cap (Benjamin Bratt), and Irene (Betty Gilpin) set out to rescue Annie (Mae Whitman) from the ocean which leads them to eventually discover Skull Island. The explorers take a journey throughout Skull Island filled with bizarre creatures, terrifying monsters, and the one and only Kong.

Skull Island is created, written, and executive produced by Brian Duffield, Jacob Robinson, Brad Graeber, Jen Chambers, and Thomas Tull. Skull Island stars Nicolas Cantu, Darren Barnet, Benjamin Bratt, Betty Gilpin, and Mae Whitman.

Skull Island starts streaming on June 22 exclusively on Netflix.

#IGN

title: Annapurna's Cocoon Is Full of Surprise and Wonder
description:
We played Annapurna's upcoming puzzle game Cocoon, which is the brainchild of Jeppe Carlsen, the lead gameplay designer of Limbo and Inside, and we came away continually surprised and delighted. Check out our hands-on impressions of this wondrous puzzle game. Previewed on PC by Will Borger.

#IGN

Marvel Studios’ Secret Invasion - Official 'Who Do You Trust' Teaser Trailer
description:
Check out the latest teaser for Marvel Studios’ Secret Invasion, an upcoming series starring Samuel L. Jackson, Cobie Smulders, Ben Mendelsohn, Olivia Colman, Don Cheadle, Emilia Clarke, and more. Marvel Studios’ Secret Invasion begins streaming on Disney+ on June 21, 2023.

#IGN #Marvel #DisneyPlus

title: Icy meat for shield surfing is actually good? #gaming #zelda #tearsofthekingdom #nintendo #shorts
Essential Cooking Recipes for The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description:
Here are four recipes that will help you on your way in The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom and it’s all presented by Boar’s Head. 

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is an unfathomable follow-up, expanding a world that already felt full beyond expectation and raising the bar ever higher into the clouds. The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom is available on Nintendo Switch and is a follow up sequel to The Legend of Zelda: Breath of The Wild.

#IGN #Zelda #Gaming

title: Shadows of the Damned: Remastered - Official Announcement Trailer
description:
Check out the reveal for Shadows of the Damned: Remaster, coming from Suda51 and the Grasshopper Manufacture team. Shadows of the Damned: Remastered is an upcoming remaster of the 2011 action-adventure game. 

Originally released in June 2011, Shadows of the Damned invited gamers to assume the role of Garcia, a hard-as-nails, leather-clad, motorcycle-riding professional demon hunter who finds his true love kidnapped by vengeance-seeking demons. As he explores the furthest reaches of the netherworld, Garcia battles through Hell and back, with danger and turmoil around every corner. Gamers will find themselves challenged by demented puzzles and thrust into gruesome battles with vile and deformed creatures that can only come from the darkest recesses of Hell.

#IGN #Gaming

title: The Biggest Summer Game Announcements So Far
description:
Summer of Gaming is in full swing, and it's brought some huge announcements like a gameplay showcase for Insomniac's Spider-Man 2, Phantom Blade Zero, Dragon's Dogma 2, GhostRunner 2, Assassin's Creed: Mirage, and more!

Presented by Xfinity.

title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth: 7 Major Details From the New Trailer
description:
Almost an entire year after we last saw Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, we’ve finally got a brand new FF7 Rebirth trailer for the second chapter in the remake trilogy, giving us a huge look at the FF7 Rebirth story, FF7 Rebirth gameplay, and FF7 Rebirth locations from beyond the walls of Midgar, and there’s plenty for fans to recognise alongside some unexpected surprises.

We’ve studied the entire Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth trailer and compared its scenes against the original game, and these are the seven major details that you need to know.

#IGN #Gaming #FinalFantasy

title: AEW: Fight Forever - Official Tag Team Hype Trailer
description:
Watch the latest AEW: Fight Forever trailer for a look at the upcoming game's tag team mode.

AEW: Fight Forever will be available on PC, PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, and Nintendo Switch on June 29, 2023.

#IGN #Gaming #Wrestling

title: Jedi: Survivor: Why is The Crossguard Lightsaber Heavy? - Beyond Clips
description:
In Jedi: Survivor, the Crossguard lightsaber stance is the equivalent to wielding a massive two-handed sword - and it makes sense that a giant chunk of metal would be heavier, but why would a lightsaber be harder to wield because of it’s blade configuration? Well, short answer, because it’s not real, duh, but we still asked game director Stig Asmussen to explain the logic for Cal’s changed movement while using this stance in combat.

#IGN #StarWars #Gaming

title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Was SGF's Biggest Surprise
description:
IGN's John Davison, Daemon Hatfield, Max Scoville, and Ryan McCaffery talk talk about the biggest announcements in Summer Game Fest including Final Fantasy VII Rebirth; the disgusting, yet, tongue-in-cheek funny Mortal Kombat 1 fatalities; and the dual storylines of Alan Wake II. 

Presented by Lenovo Legion.

title: Tekken 8 - Official Closed Network Test Announcement Trailer
description:
16 characters. 5 stages. A closed network test for Tekken 8 will be available starting July 21, 2023. Check out the latest trailer to see what to expect. The closed network test runs from July 21 to July 24 on PlayStation 5, and on July 28 to July 31 on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S, and Steam. Registrations are open now and end on June 27, 2023.

#IGN #Tekken8 #Gaming

title: Everything Announced at Summer Game Fest 2023
description: From Final Fantasy VII Rebirth to Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown, here's everything announced at Summer Game Fest 2023 in eight minutes of awesomeness.

title: Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown Looks Like a Stylish Metroidvania
description:
One of Sumer Game Fest's biggest announcements was Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown. The IGN Team discusses their unexpected excitement for the game and debates how Prince of Persia can succeed as a 2D Metroidvania. 

Presented by Immortals of Aveum.

title: What Made the Biggest Splash at Summer Game Fest?
description:
IGN's John Davison, Daemon Hatfield, Max Scoville, and Ryan McCaffery talk about their personal choice for Game of the Show. 

Spoilers! John Davison chose Lies of P. Max Scoville chose Sand Land. Ryan McCaffery's choice was Alan Wake II, and Daemon Hatfield chose Price of Persia: The Lost Crown.

Presented by the United States Air Force.

title: Spider-Man 2 PS5 Release Date Revealed - IGN Daily Fix
description:
On today's Daily Fix:

Spider-Man 2's launch date was officially revealed by Insomniac. Magic: The Gathering's upcoming Lord of the Rings expansion includes a one-of-a-kind One Ring card that collectors are already willing to pay $1 million for. Finally, Diablo 4 is Blizzard’s fastest-selling game, but one customer can’t play it.

#IGN #Gaming #PS5
